project.description: Create a Supertimeline with plaso for analysis

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DISK_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the disk image to create the supertimeline from

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DISK_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the disk for timeline output

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the supertimeline output file

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TIMEZONE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Timezone of the system under analysis
